Posts.EditableText:
Hello, does anyone know if it's possible to fix the map location so that it does not move.

For example I have a pre-mapped game area which is small enough that it fits on the screen when centered, but if the player is off in a corner of it part of it may get cut off. In this case I feel like it would make sense to just lock the map display to a centered position but I'm not sure if it's possible.
